snippet: The Treasury Department froze any assets the Lebanese might have under United States jurisdiction and prohibited Americans from doing business with them.
abstract: Treasury Dept officials blacklist Lebanese businessmen Adham Tabaja, Kassem Hejeij and Husayn Ali Faour, for extensive ties with terrorist group Hezbollah; censure includes freezing assets and forbidding Americans from conducting business with them.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department froze any assets the Lebanese might have under United States jurisdiction and prohibited Americans from doing business with them.

headline.main: Lebanon: U.S. Puts 3 Lebanese on Blacklist Over Hezbollah Links
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Lebanon: U.S. Puts 3 Lebanese on Blacklist Over Hezbollah Links

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Al-Inmaa Group for Tourism Works LLC
